title: Matchsafe, "Leg with Shoe and Stocking", late 19th century
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: In the form of a woman's leg from knee down, with bowed, low healed shoe; red leather wrapped around curvaceous calf to simulate stocking. Oval lid at top, hinged at back, release button at front. Striker on sole of shoe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Leg with Shoe and Stocking", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Plated brass, leather. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1982-23-1346.
